text: Smythe is an unincorporated community in Knight Township, Vanderburgh County, in the U.S. state of Indiana. It is located within the city limits of Evansville. ==History== Smythe was named after a local family of settlers. An old variant name of the community was called Burkhart Station. ==Geography== Smythe is located at . ==References== Category:Unincorporated communities in Vanderburgh County, Indiana Category:Unincorporated communities in Indiana
title: Smythe, Indiana
